lead_paragraph: American students are falling behind in reading and, especially, math. Just look at some of the math problems kids in other countries are doing a better job of solving.

headline.print_headline: Are You Smarter Than an 8th Grader?
headline.main: Are You Smarter Than an 8th Grader?

snippet: American students are falling behind in reading and, especially, math. Just look at some of the math problems kids in other countries are doing a better job of solving.
abstract: Nicholas Kristof Op-Ed column laments Educational Testing Service global report showing that American students are lagging behind those from other countries in math skills; holds numeracy is basic life skill and essential to understanding policy discussions; offers logical puzzle for readers to solve relying on critical thinking related to math.
